caption: Snapshot Details
description: Details of the snapshot of a resource
name: snapshot_details

created_time.description: When the snapshot was taken in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

encryption_details.description: The encryption details of the snapshot.

is_encrypted.description: Whether the snapshot is encrypted (e.g. TRUE).

uid.description: The unique identifier of the snapshot.

uid_alt.description: This is the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
